name: John Benitez
description: '''John Benitez''' (born November 7, 1957), also known as '''Jellybean''', is an American musician, songwriter, DJ, [[remix]]er, and music producer. He has produced and remixed artists such as [[Madonna]], [[Whitney Houston]], [[Michael Jackson]], and [[the Pointer Sisters]]. He was later the executive producer of Studio 54 Radio. In December 2016, ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard magazine]]'' ranked him as the 99th most successful dance artist of all-time.
